channel.title: 06' Remake - Putting it together, Piece by piece 13k+ Signed up [ Project ]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/w5kkl.jpg[/img]
06Remake [url=http://rune-tut.com]Website[/url]
06Remake [url=http://rune-tut.com]Forum[/url]
06Remake [url=http://rune-tut.com]Poll[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]PvP fully complete[/li] [li][color=orange]PvN fully complete[/li] [li][color=green]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li][color=orange]Equipment requirements[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Every modern combat spell[/li] [li][color=green]Can't mage through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Alching[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Bows/arrows[/li] [li][color=green]Can't shoot through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]All bones bury-able[/li] [li][color=green]Every prayer working properly[/li] [li][color=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li][color=green]All ores can be mined[/li] [li][color=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li][color=orange]Prospecting[/li] [li][color=green]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li][color=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bars can be made[/li] [li][color=green]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li][color=green]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All fish can be caught[/li] [li][color=green]Big net fishing[/li] [li][color=green]Correct item requirements[/li] [li][color=orange]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=orange]Moving fishing locations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Picking wheat[/li] [li][color=green]Filling flour bin[/li] [li][color=red]Bread[/li] [li][color=red]Pizza[/li] [li][color=red]Cakes[/li] [li][color=green]Potatoes[/li] [li][color=red]Eating food (in pieces)[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li][color=green]All trees cut-able[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All logs light able[/li] [li][color=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li][color=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=green]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Leather crafting[/li] [li][color=orange]Full tanning[/li] [li][color=red]Pottery (fired and unfired items)[/li] [li][color=green]Gem cutting[/li] [li][color=orange]Jewellry making[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All altars working[/li] [li][color=red]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li][color=green]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li][color=green]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All skilling sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Various attacking sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Music on region of player[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li][color=green]Tutorial Island[/li][/ul]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/3.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/5.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake1.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake2.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake3.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake4.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake5.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake6.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake7.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake8.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake9.png[/img]
[img]http://www.06remake.net/images/remake10.png[/img]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/VC9BIxEflaA[/youtube]

item.title: 06' Remake - Putting it together, Piece by piece 13k+ Signed up [ Project ]
item.dc:creator: @Supah_Flyizzle Supah Flyizzle
item.description:
@Supah_Flyizzle wrote:

[quote=“WHATBLOOD, post:37, topic:470812”][quote author=Supah Flyizzle link=topic=588289.msg4173277#msg4173277 date=1354649368]

That was actually an SQLi so shush accusing me.

Which has now been fixed.

Then why the hell do you put it in your topic title?

Oh and its fixed? it’s at 22k now

No shit it still at 22k ive only just got this problem resolved

i need to truncate the database.

there goes your “13k+ signed up,” i really don’t understand at all why you are going through the trouble of cheating by creating users yourself then deleting them when people call you out on it.

also it’s called EMPTYING the database. you could remove one user and say “oh, it’s been truncated” but if you empty something there’s nothing left. see what i mean?
[/quote]

Lets get this clear

i put 136 infront of $total_users Creating the 13698 ect

i DID NOT just make it go to 20K + it was CSS ! fgs bunch on none brain containing apes

css = cross site scripting FYI[/quote]

no, it wasn’t xss (the actual acronym for cross site scripting). again, that makes no sense. you cheat and then you delete it all, then you cheat again and delete it?

i wasn’t aware that i was the one without a brain. i mean, with logic like that, shit.

Read full topic

static boolean lier = true;

if(lier) {
client.getPacketSender().sendMessage(“please, shut up… your boring me”);
}
}

fail();
}[/code]

seriously, the things that you say.
